event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MORPH
event.text: "The failed... experiments of the Geniocracy. The strange language these... creatures speak is most undecipherable. To welcome one aboard your ship is... impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SPIDER
event.text: "An arachnid... dubiously named by humans. Barely sapient... maybe not even so. Under your care it seems... satisfied. To control even temporarily such a usually savage and disobedient creature is... impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_PONY
event.text: "A strange creature... of unknown origins, but they have spread like a... virus across the galaxy. When domesticated they can be... useful. I suppose I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_LIZARD
event.text: "Servants to... Hektar Industries. Enslaved, belittled... they trust not technology. Corby would... disapprove, but I myself see it as an... accomplishment to convince one to work with you. It is... impressive, you could say. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_OSMIAN
event.text:
"..."
Thest remains silent momentarily.
"Yes... my... people... Hmmm... Is... impressed the word I would... use? Maybe. I suppose a reward is... in order... This is certainly... data. It would be... disappointing for me to turn down... tribute. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ROCK_CULT
event.text: "A heretical splinter group... they seek the wisdom of some higher plane... yet the Ember does not reside with you. To have convinced this stubborn follower of a stringent faith is... most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_OBELISK_COG
event.text: "The mechanic offspring of the... Obelisk. Abused by their masters, they resent... authority. You are either a cruel slaver master... or a forgiving and benevolent captain. But... what is the difference in the end? To recruit such an... exotic crew member is most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_LANIUS_AUG
event.text: "The... Augmented. Lanius who have followed in the footsteps of their... Forefathers. No longer one with the Swarm, they are... exceedingly rare to come across. You have a... long reaching influence to have one of these aboard your crew. It is... impressive. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_OBELISK_ANCI
event.text: "The Obelisk... my word... how unexpected. The founders of this galaxy, the closest thing to gods we have... ever had. Well... besides... him... Nevermatter. To carry aboard your vessel an... Obelisk is most impressive. I am... very impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_HUMAN_SOLD
event.text: "A well trained... human. While their species is often seen as... common and uninteresting... recruiting one of such expertise is... impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_HUMAN_TECH
event.text: "The faithful... to their paycheck, at least... employees of Wentworth Innovations. Their original employer is certainly no... friend of yours, but to carry them aboard your ship is... impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ENGI
event.text: "The chosen protectors of the... Harmony. Yes... the Harmony does not often allow its soldiers aboard... strange vessels such as yours. The lengths you must have gone to recruit this Engi are... impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ZOLTAN_PEACE
event.text: "Guardians of the... Ministry. There is some... irony to their ruthlessness... but the Ministry has always been a well of paradox. It is hard to... impress a Peacekeeper. Just, as it is hard... to impress me. Yet, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ZOLTAN_MART
event.text: "The ruthless, devoted, and far from benevolent Martyrs... you, a Federation ally, harbor their most devoted. A Martyr, one who would... die for the cause... has betrayed it to aid you. This is... most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ORCHID_PRAT
event.text: "The stalwart Praetors, humble protectors of the... Gardenworlds. This one appears to have... abandoned its post to aid you. That is... most impressive. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ORCHID_CULT
event.text: "The mutated brainchildren of... Alkali. They are not known to care... for ideals or causes. Yet this one has decided to aid... yours. That is... most impressive. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MANTIS_SUZE
event.text: "A warrior of such fine caliber... a sworn enemy of the Federation. Yet, it has left the Hive, and is now in your... service? This is... most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MANTIS_WAR
event.text: "The Free Mantis are an... enigmatic problem. Unpredictable, unintelligent... unwashed and unaware. To possess such control over such an... unregulated beast... a mindless murderer... is... impressive? I think it is... I will accept this tribute, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SLUG_SABO
event.text: "The elusive Saboteurs - Clairvoyants, hackers, Coalition spies... none are your allies... except this one. Either it seeks... to rob your wallet, or it has found a friend in you. I will be generous and assume... the latter. This is... most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SLUG_RANG
event.text: "The finest sharpshooters in the... multiverse. Hunters, most devoted to their craft. For one to leave the vantage of their Guild, it suggests... it has found better use in you. A most utilitarian of professions, surely this implies impressive things of your... prowess. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ROCK_CRUS
event.text: "A religious juggernaut... in all senses of the word. Their beliefs are as unmoving as... they are. Yet, you have... moved them. An impressive... feat. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_CRYSTAL
event.text: "A Sentinel... the proud defenders of the... Crystalline Empire's new homeworlds. They are not always the most... recipient to outsiders, but you seem to have convinced this one to... aid you. This is... most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SHELL
event.text: "The toxic Radiant... a marvel of Dr. Alkali's finest genetic engineering. Though created for unwavering... service, it seems this one has found you a better... employer. This is... most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_LEECH
event.text: "How... electrifying. The parasitic Amperes, the Coalition's finest... born from the ruined waysides of the Eargen Republic and smithed into... a noble warrior. An expert on the best and the worst... for an Ampere to call you master you must be a most... impressive captain. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_GHOST
event.text: "Gaseous beings of undecipherable biology... and also undecipherable motives. Dynasty or Vagabond, Phantoms are not easily swayed to the side of... well... the likes of you. And for Alphas, this statement is imbued with an even... greater truth. To recruit one is... most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_LANIUS_WELD
event.text: "Perhaps some of the... oldest beings alive. Near immortal, and empowered by it, the Welders have seen all. Burdened with the witnessing of... millenia old evils, there must be a great... potential in you for one to fly in your ranks... Most impressive. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_HUMAN_MFK
event.text: "The Rebellion's finest... the wits of a Slug, quicker than a Mantis, and a relentless and unbreakable jingoist that even a Duskbringer would view extreme... How ever could you have... recruited it? No... this is not my place to ask questions. Your tribute is... very impressive. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_HUMAN_ANGEL
event.text: "I find it... ironic... the petty feuds between the Renegades and the Syndicate. With the same vigor, the same pride of their leader Vael... hmmm... the Angels would not follow your command unless you were truly worthy... a worthiness which leaves me most... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MANTIS_BISH
event.text: "For how many have fallen at the hands of this Bishop... easily you could have been another. And yet, here you stand, and this Bishop... they follow your command. I marvel at the lengths you must have gone to... achieve this. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SLUG_KNIGHT
event.text: "The most cunning of all the Slugs... the Knights of Nights represent the finest... the poster children of every virtue - and vice - the Slugs hold dear. Such crew could be considered an... indictment... but I am nothing but impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ROCK_PALA
event.text: "It is not difficult to confuse the... Chrysolic clergymen as... brutish soldiers. But the Paladins are... far from unintelligent. What they are, however... is undyingly loyal. To sway one to your side says nothing short of the mastery in diplomatic skill you possess. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_UNIQUE
event.text: "A... prestigious face, one surely recognized... to recruit such a notable figure, one of such... distinction, is a most impressive act. Yes, this tribute is... very impressive. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_A55
event.text: "I... this is... How unexpected. I was not sure... this cluster... nevermind. Do me a favor, would you, and avoid... showing this to Corby? I cannot explain for the... creed forbids me, but it is... for the best. Yes... a good tribute is in store for this. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_KIDS
event.text: "I... wh..." Thest stops entirely as he processes the pile of corpses on the ground before him. "Uhm... this is... tribute? You are... sure? Okay... I hesitate to say... well done. But... I suppose you can... expect some reward for your next journey... Now... please leave."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_WEAPONS
event.text: "Weapons - combat purposes they s-s-s-serve. Combat purposes! You are a vessel of: war. Wakeson would be [proud]. For war vessel: I provide Grant of W-w-weaponry. Grant of Weaponry: save it - for the future!!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SHIELDS
event.text: "Shields - defensive p-p-p-procedures they ensure! You pilot a: well protected vessel! Well protected vessel! For well protected vessel: I provide Grant of Sh-sh-shielding! Grant of Shielding! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_ENGINES
event.text: "Engines - for s-s-swift speeds! Swift speeds! Your vessel is: [very fast]! Fast fast fast! For speedy vessel: I provide Grant of E-E-E-Engines! Grant of Engines! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MEDBAY
event.text: "Medbay - what great [care] you provide for your crew. For your crew! You are a b-b-b-benevolent captain! For your kindness: I provide G-g-g-g-grant of Healing! Grant of Healing! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_CLONEBAY
event.text: "Clone Bay - a last [resort] - for when things go: wrong! Wrong! The [immortality] machine! Such [care] for your crew is: impressive. For your care, your preparation: I provide Grant of -Cloning-. Grant of Cloning! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_OXYGEN
event.text: "Life Support - necessity of -all- aerobic life forms. The cold [vacuum] of space = certain death. Certain death! You are: harbinger of oxygen! Of b-b-b-breathable air! Breathable air! To you I provide: Grant of Life Support! Grant of Life Support! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_TELEPORTER
event.text: "The Teleporter - strange t-t-t-technology, essential for boarding. Boarding! I confirm: this is Wakeson's second f-f-f-favorite system - the [first] is weapons. Or - or - or - was it drones? Corby forgets! Forgets! [Nevermatter]. To you I provide: Grant of Teleportation! Grant of Teleportation! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MIND
event.text: "Mind... C-c-c-control. Corby... Corby dislikes this: system. Sad. Sad levels at: 100%. But: data this provides. I suggest: not -reminding- me of this. Now, I will -provide- you with: Grant of M-m-m-m-manipulation. Grant of Manipulation! Save it - for the future! Or don't! Corby wouldn't m-m-mind..."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_HACKING
event.text: "Hacking! Corby's favorite -system-. Favorite system! Joyous [occasion]. It is: technology - but it: disrupts technology. Technology!!! For this, I most [proudly] provide: Grant of Hacking! Grant of Hacking! Cherish it! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_STEALTH
event.text: "Cloaking! For the [stealthiest] of ships. Charge your guns - hide from danger! Some would call you: a coward, but Corby d-d-d-does not think so! Corby thinks you are smart! For this, I most [proudly] provide: Grant of Cloaking! Grant of Cloaking! Cherish it! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_TEMPORAL
event.text: "[ERROR]... How d-d-d-did you -obtain- this system? I thought... it couldn't be... oh dear! Corby does not know [what] to think! We were told if... nevermind. Corby would never b-b-b-break the creed! But... well... speak nothing of this traveler. I will give you the Grant of Time! Grant of Time! Save it - for the future, and keep this a secret between us!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_DRONES
event.text: "Drones! -Drones-! Drones! Corby approves! Approves! A m-m-m-most ambidextrous system, for it serves: offense - defense - it can even [fill] in for crew. G-g-g-good system. I [recommend]. For this I provide you: Grant of Drones! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SENSORS
event.text: "Sensors - essential f-f-for full [awareness] of your ship... and the enemy's. Corby -sees- few captains who: invest in sensors. Daring choice! I appreciate your diversity. For this, I provide: Grant of Sensors. Grant -of- Sensors! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_DOORS
event.text: "Door control - she who controls the doors - controls space! Space! That is: what they told me, that is... Airlocks: the key to [boarding] c-c-c-control. This - I know. For you, I provide: Grant of Doors. G-g-g-grant of Doors! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_PILOT
event.text: "Piloting - an essential: no ship is [complete] without it! But your -piloting- is: strong! Strong! I think this = good. Corby... Corby does -not- like [wasting] money - but she is sure y-y-y-you know what you are doing! I provide you with: Grant of Piloting. Grant of [Piloting]! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_BATTERY
event.text: "Battery - I often forget this: exists. But -you- didn't! Corby likes it when [daring] captains invest in edge technology. Edge technology! I w-w-will accept: this tribute! I will provide you: Grant of Battery. Grant of B-b-b-battery! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_REACTOR
event.text: "Oh-oh-oh my - your Reactor is [huge]! Huge! So many: upgrades, so much: power! Corby can barely c-c-c-contain her excitement... er... -apologies-. Yes, this is great [tribute]. For this, I provide you with: Grant of Power. Grant of Power! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_START
event.text: "This... this is USELESS. Did you carry THIS all the way from the DROPPOINT?! HAHAHAHAH! I'm not sure whether to consider this PATHETIC or ENDEARING! But, I will ACCEPT this. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF BEGINNINGS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_KERNELS
event.text: "Hmph. A KERNEL? An ELITE KERNEL? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. Wielded by the ORCHIDS, FORGED from both metal and organic matter. FINE. I will ACCEPT this. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF GROWTH. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_KERNELS_SPORE
event.text: "Hmph. A SPORE LAUNCHER? Of the ELITE VARIETY? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. A joint VENTURE between the SHELLS and VAMPWEEDS. Disrupting your FOES with HAZARDOUS SPORES is closer to SUBTERFUGE than honest COMBAT. At least it has the COURTESY to explode as any proper WEAPON ought. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF GROWTH. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_CRYSELITE
event.text: "Hmph. A CRYSTAL LAUNCHER? An ELITE ONE? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. Deadly WEAPONS crafted by the proud Crystal people, with PIERCING properties that make SHIELDS a thing of the PAST. I DESPISE them. Obnoxious, and with a lack of SOPHISTICATION! Would I be HAILED a genius should I have invented a CANNON which launches FLESH? I think not! Oh well. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF CRYSTALS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MINELAUNCHER
event.text: "Hmph. A MINE LAUNCHER? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. LESS a weapon, and MORE a utility. In my cluster, they were HATED. But here, things seem DIFFERENT. I do not THINK your ship is CLEARED to carry this equipment, but I DOUBT you care. Oh well. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF TRAPS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_NEWGEN
event.text: "Oh my... NEW GEN Tech? Now THIS is TRIBUTE! Assembled in the finest WORKSHOPS in all of Universe 1, armaments fit only for the Rebellion's FINEST, and seemingly also YOURSELF! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF GENERATIONS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_AETHER
event.text: "Oh my... AETHER Tech? Now THIS is TRIBUTE! Forged only from the purest of AETHER by the FOREFATHERS. DAMNED might those wretches be, but their CRAFTSMANSHIP cannot be denied! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF AETHER. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_NEXUS
event.text: "Oh my... did you get this from the TRAVELING MERCHANT? A strange individual, with indiscernable MOTIVES, but few entities possess GREATER arsenals! And now, you stand to CONTEST his championship! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF MERCHANTS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SPECIAL
event.text: "Hmph. SPECIAL loot? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. What STRANGE tech, but I have seen BETTER. Your tribute is UNINSPIRING. Still, Thest demands I give SOME reward. So be it. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF SPECIALITY. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_TRANSPORT
event.text: "Hmph. TRANSPORT loot? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. I SUSPECT you did not obtain this through MORAL means, did you? You Renegades are like PIRATES, MURDERERS, VANDALS. Hmph. Years fighting as a SOLDIER OF LIBERTY and here I am dishing gifts out to SCUM. Still, Thest demands I give SOME reward. So be it. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF TRANSPORTS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_TRANSPORT_MATH
event.text: "What is THIS? It looks like a RAINBOW threw this up. Is... this a WEAPON? This is perhaps the STRANGEST tribute any challenger has given me thus far. Except maybe that CANNON. Whatever. I'll give you CREDIT for being... UNIQUE at least. I just don't know what BLESSING to give you! Is this TRANSPORT LOOT?"
"Huh. I can't say I've seen a TRANSPORT item like THIS! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF TRANSPORTS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

choice.text: No, we got it from Callie.

event.text: "You... you got it from WHO?! No, no. You're playing TRICKS on me, traveler! What a CRUEL trick! I do not APPRECIATE being made a fool of. But unfortunately, I am BOUND to giving you a blessing here for today. Fine, I shall reluctantly BLESS you with the BLESSING OF MATHEMATICS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER! Never speak to me AGAIN."

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_RENEGADES
event.text: "Oh my... the loot of ANOTHER Renegade? Hah, I find NOTHING more humorous than when you SAVAGES infight! This is a MOST UNIQUE piece of tech. I am sure Corby would wish to study it. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF RENEGADES. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_SENTRY
event.text: "Ah, a sentry gun born from the so called GENIUSES at the infernal Wentworth Innovations CORPORATION! I advise against you doing business with SUCH PEOPLE, but it is not my place to make your DECISIONS for you. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF SENTRIES. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_CURA
event.text: "Eh... You got THIS from that infernal COGNITIVE, didn't you? What disgrace, working with a VILLAINOUS machine. Do not be surprised if it STABS you in the BACK some time. But it is NOT my job to warn you. I will... enjoy MESSING with that AI. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF TASKS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_CLONECANNON
event.text: "Uhm... what is THIS? Did someone ATTACH a CLONE BAY to the back of this gun? HAHAHAHAH, HAHAHAH! This is WONDEROUS! So INVENTIVE! So ORIGINAL! I LOVE this. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF MORALITY. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MODULAR
event.text: "Hmph. This is MODULAR weaponry? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. Assembled by HEKTAR, that most GREEDY of companies. I hope it was WORTH whatever you PAID for it, traveler. Or... knowing your type, you likely didn't PAY FOR IT at all, did you? Oh well. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF MODULARITY. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_GATLING
event.text: "Oh my... is this the SUPER WEAPON employed by the Union during the Federation-Mantis War? How ever did you get your HANDS on THIS? Now, THIS IS TRIBUTE! You impress me GREATLY! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF SUPER WEAPONS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_NEXUS_RIFT
event.text: "Oh my... did you get this from the TRAVELING MERCHANT? A strange individual, with indiscernable MOTIVES, but few entities possess GREATER arsenals! And now, you stand to CONTEST his championship! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF MERCHANTS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: JUDGE_AWARD_MADNESS
event.text: "I do not quite UNDERSTAND what it is you have SHOWN me. This is a BEAM, yes? But what does it DO? MADNESS, you say? I have no IDEA what that means! Thest fancies to think he KNOWS EVERYTHING, but does he know THIS?! I doubt it. If he did, he would have SHARED it with us. RIGHT? Alas. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF POETS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGEMASTER_JUDGE_REWARD_PLATED
event.text: "The disciples... of the Forgemaster. Forsaking their former lives... to pursue their craft under his tutelage. Who can say... what swayed the loyalty of these? You are clever or powerful to have won their respect... regardless. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGEMASTER_JUDGE_REWARD_FORGEARMOR
event.text: "Armor - for defense! Defense! But -this- is [more] than that! Someone has given you clever t-t-t-tricks to hide in it! For [adaptation] and defense: I p-p-p-provide Grant of Armoring! Grant of Armoring! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: FORGEMASTER_JUDGE_REWARD_FORGEWEAPON
event.text: "Hmph. FORGED weaponry? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. NOT Alastair's best work. He can do BETTER than this. I would think him SHAMEFUL to arm a Renegade with a TOOL so MEASLY. Hmph. I should like to SPEAK to him again. NEVERTHELESS! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF FORGES. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGEMASTER_JUDGE_REWARD_FORGEWEAPON_2
event.text: "Oh my... now THIS is a WEAPON. Tribute of the HIGHEST order. Alastair's skill never FAILED to IMPRESS. He has OUTDONE himself with this. I should like to SPEAK to him again. NEVERTHELESS! I shall BLESS you with the GREATER BLESSING OF FORGES. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGEMASTER_JUDGE_REWARD_ANCWEAPON
event.text: Wakeson stands silently for a moment. "Renegade. WHERE did this ABOMINATION come from? It should NEVER have been CREATED. Would like that I had not SEEN it. But information it is. I had HOPED that none would have FOUND the secret. Still, our RULES dictate I REWARD you for this. Do not MEDDLE again, Renegade. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF THE FOOLHARDY. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGEMASTER_JUDGE_REWARD_TERMINUS
event.text: Wakeson stands silently for a moment. "Why are renegades LIKE THIS... I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF TWISTEDNESS regardless. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_DIAMOND
event.text: "The elusive... metal diamonds... beings that aren't from this... cluster, enigmatic creatures that you... somehow managed to befriend... You can say I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_OPERATOR
event.text: "Ah... the ever intriguing... metal operators... beings made in a far... far away cluster, a marvel of technology that you... now have as your crew... You can say I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_METAL_LANIUS
event.text: "This lanius...it's...different from the...others...their body's metal isn't...present in this clusters...where did you...find them? I can very much...say that I'm impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_GOLDEN
event.text: "This... this weapon is... It doesn't make any SENSE to me! It bears the MARKS of the FOREFATHERS, YET it's BUILT completely DIFFERENTLY from anything they ever MADE! Very WELL then, I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF OPULENCE. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_COPPER
event.text: "A...DRONE?! WHO do you think I AM Renegade?! If Thest hadn't BANNED me from killing you lot I would have CRUSHED your puny head with my FISTS! Unfortunately, I am BOUND by the CREED to give you a BOON, even for a offering as PITIFUL as this RUSTING DRONE, nevertheless I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF RUSTING. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_ADAMANTINE
event.text: "AHAHAHAHA! WHAT is THIS?! A AUGMENT that can make CREW out of FUEL?! AHAHAHA! Renegade, I thank you for the ENTRETAINEMENT you gave me by showing me THIS! AHAHAH! Yes, this IS tribute! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF CLONING. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_SALT
event.text: "That... that's... a salt person... one which isn't... that bounty hunter... how...?. I... I thought this was impossible... You can say I am... flabbergasted. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_SPHERAX
event.text: "That... that form... I was certain they had vanished before... and yet, traveler... you have acquired this... unbelievable follower. I'm speechless. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_SALT_2
event.text: "Ah... the great... bounty hunter... the last one of his kind...such a heavy weight placed... on his shoulders. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_COMMONWEALTH
event.text: "That... It can't... It can't be... You... Brought one of them back to... life. I... I thought this was impossible... You can say I am... flabbergasted. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_SNOWMAN
event.text: "A...living snowman... It seems all those...stories for kids can...actually happen... you learn...something new everyday... You can say I am... very... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_LAVAMAN
event.text: "A...living lava being... I suppose... something like that... was eventually...going to be attempted... You can say I am... very... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_AIAVATAR
event.text: "Now that's...fascinating...a completely AI crew...with no physical...body and yet...can interact with our world...you can very much...say that I'm impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_ION
event.text: "But that... That EQUIPMENT! Renegade, you don't have the SMALLEST idea of what you have in your HANDS do you? This equipment it's... I THOUGHT all of it was DESTROYED by our FOREFATHERS! But seeing it with my own EYES then maybe, maybe we might be ABLE to... BAH! What am I SAYING, it doesn't MATTER anymore, NEVERTHELESS, I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF ION. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_SALT_GUN
event.text: "A SALT GUN? Do you take ME for a FOOL, RENEGADE? I will have you KNOW I'm personally not a FAN of SEASONING! REGARDLESS, this is tribute, I SUPPOUSE, I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF SALT. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_WITHER_GUN
event.text: "THIS...WEAPON it's...the most BEAUTIFUL thing I have EVER seen! The MATERIAL, the EXECUTION! All that's missing is some TESTING, thank you RENEGADE, for showing me this BEAUTIFUL pierce of TECHNOLOGY! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF HAUNTING. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_HAUNT_CREW
event.text: "Is... is that a actual...ghost? ... I must say I... didn't think that was possible... frankly I can scarcely... believe my own eyes... You can say I am... very... very... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_HAUNT_GUN
event.text: "WHAT in the GREAT ADMIRAL'S top shape ARSE is THIS?! I have never SEEN anything like this! WHERE did you acquire this WEIRD gun, RENEGADE? Ah, FORGET it! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF HAUNTING. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_REVENANT_CREW
event.text: "Is... is that an actual... ghost? I must say, I... didn't think it was possible... to bring back the dead. Frankly... I can scarcely... believe my own eyes... You can say I am... very... very... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: FORGOTTEN_JUDGE_REWARD_REVENANT_GUN
event.text: "WHAT in the GREAT ADMIRAL'S top shape ARSE is THIS?! I have never SEEN anything like this! WHERE did you acquire this WEIRD gun, RENEGADE? It's... IT'S WONDERFUL! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF THE UNDEAD. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: IPS_JUDGE_REWARD_HOLO
event.text: "This construct... it comes from a different era, a... precursor of hardlight... a simple AI, but one that... interacts with the world... in a way no computer can... I'm curious, of... which realm it came from... Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: IPS_JUDGE_REWARD_SONA
event.text: "Who... are you..? I can sense it... you're not from here... and you feel lost... out of place. ...Do not be afraid... I'm sure the answers... will come your way soon... Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey." Sona would simply respond with as polite a bow as she could muster. "I appreciate the words of wisdom... thank you."

event.name: IPS_JUDGE_REWARD_TECH
event.text: "What is this TECH? Something about it... it seems so MUNDANE, yet completely out of this WORLD at the same TIME! I don't KNOW where YOU found it, but I HOPE that it served you VERY well indeed! Very WELL then, I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF INSURRECTION. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: CNC_JUDGE_REWARD_NUKE
event.text: "A NUKE? I have not seen one of THESE in AGES! It is not the most ORIGINAL weapon, but I must ADMIT, I wish they were EASIER to COME BY in this era. There are a few PEOPLE whose THROATS I'd enjoy SHOVING THIS DOWN! HAH! For this, I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF NUKES. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: FISH_JUDGE_REWARD_FISH
event.text: "This... this is a fish? I'm not sure why you have brought me this, however this IS tribute, if only because I'm not sure how you got your hands on it. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF FISH. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DEEPONE
event.text: "Odd creatures... of dubious origins. Something about them... disturbs me. Disturbed, impressed... and intrigued. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DDSOULPLAGUE
event.text: "Their pretty colors... may allure some, but I know better. I would be... disturbed, were I not so... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DDCORRUPTOR
event.text: "Corruptor - for c-c-corrupting all! You pilot a: vessel worth steering clear from! Scary! Scary! For scary vessel: I provide Grant of C-c-corrupting! Grant of Corrupting! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DEEPONE_TECH
event.text: "Oh my... DEEP ONE Tech? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. These fish-men are a STRANGE people, with even STRANGER technology! I'd LOATHE to face all those GLARING lights in battle, but I DIGRESS. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF DREAD. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DISPARITY_TECH
event.text: "Oh my... DISPARITY Tech? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. You can practically SMELL the bloodshed that's been wrought with this tech, and YET... there's a DARKER presence there, too... but I DIGRESS. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF RAVENOUS DARKNESS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DDSOULPLAGUE_TECH
event.text: "Oh my... SOULPLAGUE Tech? Sure. This is tribute, I suppose. Its many colors may FOOL the UNSUSPECTING, but I know BETTER! This is dangerous, DANGEROUS stuff... but I DIGRESS. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF IRIDESCENT CORRUPTION. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DDDEEPONE_ELITE
event.text: "These ones... understand the gravity of the pact they've made. Their dedication... to their cause, as ominous as it is... impresses me. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DISPARITY_ELITE
event.text: "The Separatists do not typically find themselves... so willing to shed blood. One must wonder, if their cause... is worth the rising death toll. Regardless... of the answer, this is most... impressive. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DDSERAPHIM
event.text: "I... must wonder, if... the one in the suit is aware that... oh, no matter. To think that... one so resplendent, and otherworldly... has travelled all this way, just to ally with you... this is most impressive, indeed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: DD_JUDGE_REWARD_DDFALSERADIANCE_GEAR
event.text: "What... IS this? Is it ALIVE? I can't say I've EVER seen anything like it... did THEST put you UP TO THIS?! HE would know! Did he FORGET to tell us? Is THIS his way of TELLING US? Well, NO MATTER! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF FALLEN GRACE. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: OE_JUDGE_REWARD_SUPER_SHIELDS
event.text: "Auxiliary Shields - defensive p-p-p-procedures they ensure! You pilot a: well protected vessel! Well protected vessel! For well protected vessel: I provide Grant of Au-Au-auxiliary shielding! Grant of Auxiliary Shielding! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: OE_JUDGE_REWARD_CLONE_CRIME
event.text: "What have you done to your clonebay - that is ap-p-p-palling! You - you should be facing a jury, your vessel is ...a crime!.. against the galaxy! Your sh-ship should be [destroyed], however I will still give you the Grant of an Ill-Illegally Modified Clonebay! Grant of Illegally Modified Clonebay! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: LI_JUDGE_REWARD_ABLATIVE_ARMOR
event.text: "Ablative Armor - defensive p-p-p-procedures it ensures! You pilot a: well protected vessel! Well protected vessel! For well protected vessel: I provide Grant of Ab-Ab-ablative Armor! Grant of Ablative Armor! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: LI_JUDGE_REWARD_INFUSION_BAY
event.text: "Infusion Bay - risk, and reward! R-r-risk, r-r-r-reward... [which] is heavier? You are: here... a captain: -considerate- of potentiality! For heavy consideration, and heavier p-p-potential: I provide Grant of I-i-i-infusion! Grant of Infusion! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: LI_JUDGE_REWARD_SHOCK_NEUTRALIZER
event.text: "Shock Neutralizer - for p-p-p-protection against ions! Ions! A Technology - for [helping] other technology! Technology!!! For this: I [proudly] provide Grant of Shock Neutralizer! Grant of Shock Neutralizer! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: LI_JUDGE_REWARD_SYSTEM_BRACERS
event.text: "System Bracers - for p-p-p-protection against system damage! You pilot a: reliable vessel! Reliable vessel! For reliable vessel: I provide Grant of Br-br-bracing! Grant of Bracing! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: LI_JUDGE_REWARD_TARGETING_CORE
event.text: "Dedicated Targeting Core - for a d-d-dedicated sharpshooter! No enemy can: evade you now! For dedicated sharpshooter: I provide Grant of T-t-targeting! Grant of Targeting! Save it - for the future!"

event.name: AA_JUDGE_REWARD_DUSTWORM
event.text: "Strange beings. Alien to this reality... but why, I... cannot say. Your influence must reach... far, your careful searching... lucrative. To recruit such species is an... impressive feat. Yes, I am... impressed. Well done, traveler. Expect... rewards before your next journey."

event.name: AA_JUDGE_REWARD_DISRUPTOR
event.text: "A BEAM? That IONIZES? A PECULIAR weapon, from a PECULIAR source... I CANNOT tell you what I have SEEN, for the CREED binds me, but it was BOUND to appear SOONER rather than LATER! It is TRIBUTE, I suppose. So, I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF INSULATION. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: AA_JUDGE_REWARD_INFUSER
event.text: "What... is THIS? It does not FIRE, but it helps OTHERS do the same? Hah! Such tribute is NOT impressive to the UNTRAINED eye... but one should NEVER underestimate a weapon BOOSTED by the RIGHT TECHNOLOGY! I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF EMPOWERMENT. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: AA_JUDGE_REWARD_IMAGINATOR
event.text: "I do not quite UNDERSTAND what it is you have SHOWN me. This is a BEAM, yes? But what does it DO? WONDER, you say? I have no IDEA what that means! Thest fancies to think he KNOWS EVERYTHING, but does he know THIS?! I doubt it. If he did, he would have SHARED it with us. RIGHT? Alas. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF IMAGINATION. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"

event.name: AA_JUDGE_REWARD_MADNESS
event.text: "I do not quite UNDERSTAND what it is you have SHOWN me. This is an INFUSER, yes? But what does it DO? MADNESS, you say? I have no IDEA what that means! Thest fancies to think he KNOWS EVERYTHING, but does he know THIS?! I doubt it. If he did, he would have SHARED it with us. RIGHT? Alas. I shall BLESS you with the BLESSING OF POETS. But have PATIENCE. It is not for now, but for LATER!"
